header.div: What will I learn in this unit?

ol.li: watch examples of students answering questions about themselves in the first part of the speaking test;
think about how to deal with difficult questions or when you are not sure about something;
learn what you should do in Part 2 of the speaking test;
watch a candidate answering a Part 2 task;
look at ways of making complex notes;
watch the examiner ask the candidate a follow up question.
